function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on prediction systems for IAQ monitoring","Impact":"Inability to provide reliable prediction decisions for IAQ monitoring","Mitigation":"Conduct further research on combining IoT monitoring systems with machine learning and deep learning networks","Technologies":"IoT, machine learning, deep learning","People":"New age researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, academia"},{"Description":"Low performance of non-IoT based IAQ monitoring systems","Impact":"Ineffectiveness in real-time monitoring of IAQ due to system limitations","Mitigation":"Focus on improving the performance of non-IoT based monitoring systems, consider multiple pollutants, and address sensor calibration challenges","Technologies":"Architecture optimization, sensor calibration, pollutant analysis","People":"Researchers, system developers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, system developers"},{"Description":"Challenges with sensor calibration and practical implementation","Impact":"Inaccurate IAQ monitoring and lack of desired performance","Mitigation":"Address sensor calibration challenges, conduct practical implementation testing, and improve overall system design","Technologies":"Sensor calibration technology, practical testing, system design optimization","People":"Researchers, system developers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, system developers"}]}
